title: Revocation of Privileges Act, 1992
description: Official consolidated text of Revocation of Privileges Act, 1992 (VIII of 1992) published by The Pakistan Code (Civil Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title and commencement
provisions.content:
(1) This Act may be called the Revocation of
Privileges Act, 1992.
(2) It shall come into force at once and shall be deemed to have come into force on and
from the 3rd day of May, 1992.

provisions.title: Section 2. Annulment of certain Bills.⸻ Notwithstanding anything contained in any other law or
provisions.content:
the rules for the time being in force, the President’s Salary, Allowances and Privileges
(Amendment) Bill, 1992, the Prime Minister’s Salary, Allowances and Privileges (Amendment)
Bill, 1992, the Federal Ministers and Ministers of State Salaries, Allowances and Privileges
(Amendment) Bill, 1992, the Members of Parliament (Salaries and Allowances) (Amendment)
Bill, 1992, the Chairman and Speaker (Salaries, Allowances and Privileges) (Amendment) Bill,
1992, and the Deputy Chairman and Deputy Speaker (Salaries, Allowances and Privileges)
(Amendment) Bill, 1992, passed by the National Assembly of Pakistan on the 3rd day of May,
1992, resolved to be withdrawn by a unanimous Resolution of the National Assembly, whether
transmitted to the President for his assent or not, or whether deemed to have become Acts of
Parliament by afflux of time or not, are withdrawn, revoked and annulled and shall be deemed
always to have been withdrawn, revoked and annulled and of no legal effect.
